title: Sunnah at the time of Corona, Day 29 w/ Dr. Khaled Bahjri
creator: Muslim American Society Podcast
subject: Podcast
description: Join me in a conversation with Sh. Asad Zaman from Minnesota. We sat down at the #MASCON2019 in Chicago, where over 25k muslims attended an excellent convention. https://www.masconvention.org Look out for more conversations like this with our MAS members from across the country. We'd love to hear from you at podcast@muslimamericansociety.org  ---- Visit muslimamericansociety.org to learn more about our work and how you can get involved. Checkout our latest books at maspublishing.org : Transformed by Worship: The Tarbiya Effects of Ritual Worship in Islam by Dr. Salah Soltan How to Love the Prophet ﷺ by Dr. Ali Badahdah SincerityThe Essential Quality by Yusuf Al-Qaradawi Rising Soul: A Guide to Personal Development by Dr. Muhammad Mansur ---- Muslim American Society is committed to the vision of a virtuous and just American society and its mission is to move people to strive for God consciousness, liberty, and justice, and to convey Islam with utmost clarity. --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/muslimamericansociety/message

metadata.description:
Join me in a conversation with Sh. Asad Zaman from Minnesota. We sat down at the #MASCON2019 in Chicago, where over 25k muslims attended an excellent convention. https://www.masconvention.org

Look out for more conversations like this with our MAS members from across the country. We'd love to hear from you at podcast@muslimamericansociety.org 


----

Visit muslimamericansociety.org to learn more about our work and how you can get involved.

Checkout our latest books at maspublishing.org:

Transformed by Worship: The Tarbiya Effects of Ritual Worship in Islam by Dr. Salah Soltan

How to Love the Prophet ﷺ by Dr. Ali Badahdah

SincerityThe Essential Quality by Yusuf Al-Qaradawi

Rising Soul: A Guide to Personal Development by Dr. Muhammad Mansur

----

Muslim American Society is committed to the vision of a virtuous and just American society and its mission is to move people to strive for God consciousness, liberty, and justice, and to convey Islam with utmost clarity.

--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/muslimamericansociety/message
